Or perhaps, discovering that your spouse had not only been “having an affair”, but had been conspiring with the “other” to have you killed so they could collect the insurance policy. A rude and painful awakening occurs when you discover that things you have believed in for a very long time, things perhaps you have built your life around, have never been what they appeared to be, but rather an expertly crafted pack of lies created to harm and enslave you. When we desire to “know the truth”, and then the truth is revealed, what do we do if it is not the truth we wanted to hear? As the GA dispensations continued following the initial revelations of the Treaty of Altair, I realized how grateful I was to finally understand, yet I also acknowledge how “Knowing” has suddenly and forcefully “burst my bubble” of naïveté concerning the type of world within which we presently live.
